snippet: He was set to be the host of a dinner for the Radio and Television Correspondents' Association in Washington, but recently the Fox News commentator Greta Van Susteren had called for a boycott of the event.
abstract: He was set to be the host of a dinner for the Radio and Television Correspondents' Association in Washington, but recently the Fox News commentator Greta Van Susteren had called for a boycott of the event.

headline.main: Louis C.K. Withdraws as Host After Van Susteren's Opposition
headline.print_headline: Comedian Withdraws as Host of Media Dinner
